description: Fraction operations, comparing fractions, fractions of amounts, converting between fractions and decimals.

concepts.name: Fractions of a Whole
concepts.description: Finding fractions of amounts, visual fraction problems
common_misconceptions: Dividing by numerator instead of denominator
question_patterns: A wall is divided into {N} sections. {X}/{N} are painted purple, {Y}/{N} yellow. How many green?
example_stems: Jack paints 3/10 purple and 2/5 yellow. How many of 10 sections are green?

concepts.name: Comparing Fractions
concepts.description: Comparing fractions to each other and to benchmarks like 1/2, 1/4, 3/4
common_misconceptions: Thinking larger denominator means larger fraction
question_patterns: Andy ate {X}, Bella ate {Y}, Carlo ate the rest. Which statements are true?
example_stems: Andy ate 1/5, Bella 2/5, Carlo the rest. Is 'Carlo ate less than half' true?

concepts.name: Fraction Operations
concepts.description: Adding, subtracting, and comparing fractions in word problems
question_patterns: Quoc bought {N} pizzas. Amina ate {X}, Fred ate {Y}, Sally ate {Z}. How much more did Quoc eat than Amina?
example_stems: From 4 pizzas: Amina ate 4/5, Fred ate 1 and 1/5, Sally ate 3/5. How much more did Quoc eat than Amina?

concepts.name: Converting Fractions and Decimals
concepts.description: Converting between fractions, decimals, and percentages
question_patterns: Convert {decimal} to a fraction in simplest form.
